tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE survey_results_survey
(
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    dissatisfaction_reason VARCHAR(255),
    survey_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE survey_response (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    question_id INT,
    respondent_id INT,
    response_text TEXT
);
